title: ADC duel challenge, who is the best adc at dueling?
body:
Rules, both duelists are in range of each other. ~~No running, you have to stand still.~~ No jumping away from the enemy using abilities. Stealth is okay as long as you don't move in stealth. Both players get the same build which they both agree on.

**EDIT: okay you can move, but you have to stay in range of opponent. No juking or running away either. And no moving while stealthed**

The Question: which adc is the best at dueling?

The challenge: you pick an ADC, suggest a build and follow these rules. I pick any champion and try to duel you under these rules.
